title: Secure Construction Financing
description: A developer needs to secure a loan to finance the construction of a new condominium project.

tasks.description: Prepare a comprehensive loan package, including the project pro-forma, architectural plans, and developer's resume.
tasks.expected_outcome: A complete and professional loan request package is assembled.

tasks.description: Submit the loan package to multiple commercial banks and lenders.
tasks.expected_outcome: The loan request is sent to at least five potential lenders.

tasks.description: Compare loan term sheets from interested lenders and negotiate the final loan terms.
tasks.expected_outcome: The developer accepts a term sheet and moves toward closing the construction loan.
